normalized: lunch break the next day――
i had ended up coming to the elite building to see yukikaze.
last night was on my mind, and i hadn't been able to get much sleep.
it hadn't been my true intention by any means, but i wanted to apologize for looking like i was siding with shizuru-san's opinion.
thus, i had made my way to the elite building, which, by nature, normal students couldn't visit.

for starters, the general course students and the scholarship students (including the valet and maid course students) were completely separated by a river that ran through the centre of the academy grounds.
even if you crossed the one bridge that linked the two areas, a small forest was yet another obstacle, so the appearance of the elite building couldn't be seen from the general course students' side.
thus, i had only seen photographs of it in documents prior to the infiltration, so this was my first time seeing the elite building with my own eyes.

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's like the estate of a noble in the middle ages…

clearly different from the general course student side, with its modern appearance, it was majestic and stately no matter where you looked, so, as one would expect, a different atmosphere hung over the place.
i erased my presence, and stood very nonchalantly in a corner of the front garden, which kept going all the way to the elite building.
since it was lunch break, scholarship students were going back and forth alongside me, accompanied by valets or maids, but they weren't paying attention to me.
i wasn't being especially obvious, but i wasn't using my wind powers either.
even without something so grandiose, i was able to quite naturally make myself inconspicuous, as needed.
that was taimanin “grass”.
like that, i was waiting for yukikaze to come out.
of course, i could even get inside the elite building.
since it was off limits to general course pupils, a doorman was standing in the entrance to the school building, and he appeared to be scrutinizing student admittance, but his movements were amateur.
it would probably be easy to slip past that guard and sneak in, but i could not afford to stand out, just in case.
i hadn't even called yukikaze on my cell phone.
since there was a possibility that the base station was being bugged, it was an ironclad rule of infiltration that one abstained from using cell phones during a mission.
no, that wasn't it, was it?
even if i didn't call in advance, i had a feeling that i would be able to meet yukikaze if i waited like this.
she may have been in a bad mood last night, but we had been together for a long time.
i understood yukikaze's behaviour to an extent.
the thought occurred that i ought to wait for yukikaze in the general course student area, and not come to the scholarship student area, but nonetheless, that really weighed on my mind, so――

name: yukikaze
normalized: tatsurou!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uwaahh!
being slapped on the back from behind all of a sudden, i was so surprised that i jumped.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ahaha, tatsurou's too surprised!
when i turned around, yukikaze was standing there and laughing.
when had she…?!

name: yukikaze
normalized: what are you doing in a place like this?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i could ask yukikaze the same thing!

name: yukikaze
normalized: why are you so surprised?

name: tatsurou
normalized: well, because, i thought you were in the elite building… you didn't come out in a way that i wouldn't notice and go around behind me, did you?

name: yukikaze
normalized: i wouldn't do a strange thing like that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: 4th period is phys ed, so i'd gone to the gym.
and when i came back, tatsurou was standing there vacantly, like an idiot.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, was that so…?
i had just noticed it now, but yukikaze was holding a bag with the school's emblem on it.
her gym uniform was probably inside it.

this school made a distinction between the general course students and the scholarship students at every opportunity, but the sports-related facilities, such as the gymnasium and the sports ground, were communal.

name: yukikaze
normalized: ――so, what are you doing in a place like this?
yukikaze said the same thing as before.
however, unlike before, when she had watched me get surprised and simply smiled, her voice was subtly scary.
――i still haven't forgiven you for yesterday.
the eyes that looked at me were saying that.
at this point, i could do nothing but meekly apologize anymore.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze, it's about yesterday――

name: yukikaze
normalized: come this way a sec.
the moment that i opened my mouth, yukikaze had grabbed firm hold of my arm.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
wait, what?

name: yukikaze
normalized: mission talk!

name: tatsurou
normalized: m, mission?
yukikaze pulled my bewildered self around the other side of a nearby tree.

name: yukikaze
normalized: there's nobody around, right?
after quickly making sure that nobody's eyes were around, yukikaze spoke.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yesterday, after that, i encountered the rubber woman you mentioned.

name: tatsurou
normalized: wha?!
really?!
i became understandably nervous.
yukikaze nodded, and

name: yukikaze
normalized: no mistaking it.
she was dressed like i had heard.

name: yukikaze
normalized: whole body covered with black rubber, even the eyes.
holding a ball gag in her mouth.
a genuine pervert.
i doubted my eyes.
yukikaze said, while knitting her brows.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's the same woman.
did you fight with her?

name: yukikaze
normalized: a little.
she really is a master.
but when the guards here were about to arrive, she ran away immediately.
she did that when tatsurou met her too, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's right.
but, if that's the case, why go out of her way to appear?

name: yukikaze
normalized: well…
before yukikaze could answer, i suddenly realized,

name: tatsurou
normalized: could it be a probing move?
knowing that yukikaze's moved in?

name: yukikaze
normalized: …maybe.
she knew when to withdraw too perfectly.
yukikaze said, with a face that looked like she was thinking back on the rubber woman's behaviour.

name: yukikaze
normalized: so that means our activity is being monitored?

name: tatsurou
normalized: it's highly likely… sorry.
all because we messed up…
i bit my lip.
i recalled what i had been told by murasaki-sensei before my departure.
battle is the last resort.
the success or failure of this mission is dependent on “grass”.
i hadn't been able to follow that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey, don't be sad.
yukikaze suddenly held my downcast head in her arms.
俺より小さいゆきかぜがそうすると、まるで背中から俺に飛びついた。

name: yukikaze
normalized: battle is the foundation of a taimanin mission.
i did come for that, after all.
i don't mind, i don't mind.
yukikaze said, in order to cheer me up.
those seemed to be the real feelings of yukikaze, the battle specialist.

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's true, isn't it…?
still, i'm sorry…

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's why i'm saying, there's no need to be sorry.
we can't do anything about it now, right?
yukikaze breathed a little sigh, then released my body and went around in front of me.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey, raise your face.

name: tatsurou
normalized: o, okay…
and then――

name: yukikaze
normalized: chuu.
a surprise kiss.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
wha?!
our lips had touched for a mere instant.
yukikaze immediately jumped backwards.

name: yukikaze
normalized: d, did you cheer up?!
i won't know unless you show it.
her voice sounded excited, and the corners of her eyes were red.
it was the first time she had done such a thing.
i understood that yukikaze had mustered considerable courage.
had i been so depressed that i made her go that far?

name: tatsurou
normalized: yeah… that cheered me up.
thanks, yukikaze.

name: yukikaze
normalized: then it's okay… tatsurou really is a handful.
yukikaze said bashfully, pouting her lips.
and then, i suppose to hide her embarrassment, she started talking quickly and returned to the original topic.

name: yukikaze
normalized: b, but, anyway.
that rubber woman attacked you guys too, but it seems like she's not washizu's assassin, right?
if it's like you told me yesterday.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
yeah… it did feel like that…
we had explained the full story of being attacked to yukikaze.
hiding the fact that shizuru-san had been afflicted by an aphrodisiac, and what i had done to dispel it.
there was a stinging pain in my chest.

name: yukikaze
normalized: if that's the case…
after pondering for a little while, yukikaze said,

name: yukikaze
normalized: we'd better not take any action for a while, right?
we don't understand the rubber woman's objective very well.

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh…?

name: yukikaze
normalized: because of that, i say we be a little quieter.

name: tatsurou
normalized: th, that's right, isn't it?
good!
i nodded in relief.
if even yukikaze herself thought so, then that was the safest bet.
“looks like her anger from yesterday's settled down.
it had been short-sighted of me to think something like that.

name: yukikaze
normalized: all the same, i don't forgive you for siding with that old lady yesterday.

name: tatsurou
normalized: uuh…
yukikaze suddenly glowered at me with terrible eyes, and a terrible voice.
it was quite the surprise attack.
i couldn't even make a sound.

name: yukikaze
normalized: by any chance, did you come here because i got angry?
she asked me with a smile.
scary.

name: tatsurou
normalized: w, well, that's right, but…

name: yukikaze
normalized: well?
she glared at me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: n, no, you're right.
i came to apologize for that.
sorry, yukikaze.
i'm really sorry.
forgive me.
i bowed my head like a longheaded grasshopper.
that was all i could do.

name: yukikaze
normalized: okay, okay, i appreciate the honesty♪
yukikaze was instantly in a good mood.
who was the one who had just kissed me and said she didn't need apologies?
of course, she didn't kiss me again or anything.

name: yukikaze
normalized: well, shall we go eat?
lunch together.
okay?

name: tatsurou
normalized: eh?
together?

name: yukikaze
normalized: what?
you don't want to?
surely you're not eating together with that woman, right?
i waved my hand in a panic due to yukikaze, who made a scary face again.

name: tatsurou
normalized: no way!
it's nothing like that!
i'm saying, yukikaze has the scholarship student dining hall, so isn't it impossible to eat together with me, a general course student?

name: yukikaze
normalized: fufu, that's not the case.
yukikaze puffed her chest out boastfully.

name: yukikaze
normalized: under school regulations, it's prohibited for general course students to go to the scholarship student dining room, but there's nothing in particular written about scholarship students going to the general course student cafeteria.
didn't you know that?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ahh… now that you mention it…
scholarship students, accompanied by their valets, had come to the cafeteria before, hadn't they?
i had figured they had some kind of business there.
had they been coming expressly to eat?

name: yukikaze
normalized: that's the way it is, so treat me to lunch, okay?
you've been here for a month now, so you'll know which things are tasty, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: that's easy.

name: yukikaze
normalized: then let's go.
i'm hungry!
saying so, yukikaze started walking, but suddenly spun around and changed direction.

name: yukikaze
normalized: hold on a minute!
there, at the point to which yukikaze had started to run, was inui, her valet.
it seemed that he had been waiting there all this time.
yukikaze told inui something, then handed over her bag and immediately came back.

name: tatsurou
normalized: what's going on?

name: yukikaze
normalized: if i said nothing, he'd follow me everywhere.

name: tatsurou
normalized: so why give him your bag?

name: yukikaze
normalized: because, he'll stick close to me unless i order him to do some work.
he'd be in the way, right?

name: tatsurou
normalized: he certainly would be, but your gym outfit is in there, right?
it'll have gotten filthy with your sweat.
you're going to let him wash that?

name: yukikaze
normalized: that doesn't mean i'm letting him wash it.
i just told him to put it in my room!
perhaps because she thought i had criticized her ordering her valet around, yukikaze roughened her voice a little.

name: tatsurou
normalized: ah, sorry.
i didn't really mean to insult you, but this is a pretty weird school, isn't it?

name: yukikaze
normalized: truly weird.
too weird!
yukikaze said, flatly, and started walking without even glancing at inui, who was bowing his head over there as if to say, 「take care, scholarship student-sama.

name: yukikaze
normalized: what's wrong?
let's go already!

name: tatsurou
normalized: o, okay.
she seemed to lose her temper again when i pried too much about the scholarship students.
i stood next to yukikaze, and tried inquiring about something else that had concerned me.

name: tatsurou
normalized: yukikaze, about that rubber woman――

name: yukikaze
normalized: if it's about her true identity, i don't know.
she seemed like she knew about me, though.

name: tatsurou
normalized: is that so?
that's worrisome, isn't it?

name: yukikaze
normalized: hey, i am famous, after all.

name: tatsurou
normalized: well… putting that aside, you weren't wounded or anything?

name: yukikaze
normalized: who do you think i am?
yukikaze said, with plenty of confidence, as if to say, “why would you ask such a thing?

name: tatsurou
normalized: i guess you're right.
if that was the case, then i was relieved for now.
it would be serious if, by any chance, she had that aphrodisiac used on her.
if it came to that, i would have no choice but to do something.
i would be lying if i said i hadn't thought about that.
but, i didn't want to have my first time with yukikaze be for the sake of saving her from an aphrodisiac like that.
i realized that was unfair to shizuru-san, but those were my true feelings.

name: yukikaze
normalized: that was delicious.
thanks for the treat♪

name: tatsurou
normalized: was that enough?

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah, i'm full, i'm full♪
yukikaze rubbed her stomach, seeming happy from the bottom of her heart.
like me, she had quickly polished off a large serving of raw eggs on a mix of gyuumeshi, curry and tonkatsu.
(tl: gyuumeshi is another word for gyuudon.
tonkatsu is a pork cutlet, deep fried and served with rice and vegetables on the side.
where that went in her slender body was truly a mystery.
according to yukikaze, it seemed that lightning escape users needed their energy, but even considering that, she ate a lot.
it felt nice to see that, and fun to have a meal together.

name: yukikaze
normalized: all right, i'm off, then.
if i'm late, inui-san will come.
yukikaze said, and stood from her seat.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i understand.
see you later.
i also stood up.

name: yukikaze
normalized: yeah.

name: tatsurou
normalized: i'm always eating here at lunch.

name: yukikaze
normalized: okay!

name: tatsurou
normalized: bye.

name: yukikaze
normalized: bye♪
yukikaze waved her hand a little, then went back to the elite building with springy steps.
good.
it looked like that had perfectly restored her good mood.
and as things stood, it seemed she would come here every day.

name: morita
normalized: well～～, akiyama-chan's showing off, huh?

name: tatsurou
normalized: oh, were you here?

name: morita
normalized: was i here?!
honestly, how did you get to know such a beautiful girl?
and what's more, a scholarship student!

name: tatsurou
normalized: uh, i got lost, i guess?
hahaha.
i laughed evasively and dodged the question.

name: morita
normalized: you serious?!
i wanna get lost too!
that said… akiyama, were the rumours about you-know-what true?
morita asked, lowering his voice.

name: tatsurou
normalized: rumours?
i asked back, not understanding what he was talking about, and morita became exaggeratedly surprised.

name: morita
normalized: huh?!
didn't you get to know the scholarship student girl because of that?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: what do you mean?

name: morita
normalized: you're a seriously amazing guy, aren't you?
after looking around restlessly, morita began explaining, in the kind of voice that would be audible only to me.
it seemed that it was the kind of subject matter that even morita, who had been born mouth-first, was hesitant to talk about in public.

name: morita
normalized: listen up.
rumour has it, the boy scholarship students are future nobles, so to speak, and the girl students are prospective wives for the future nobles.

name: morita
normalized: there are also some girls who, instead of going that route, become successful in the entertainment industry.

name: morita
normalized: those ones are prominent nowadays, and the rumour is, it's thanks to that kind of training, for when they become a noble's wife!

name: tatsurou
normalized: that kind?
considering his long explanation, his crucial point wasn't clear.
what was he trying to tell me?
morita made eyes that looked like he wanted to say, 『you're a slow guy.

name: morita
normalized: that kind means that kind.
dirty stuff!

name: tatsurou
normalized: huh?

name: morita
normalized: it's dirty stuff!
they say that because that training's so amazing, they make it in the entertainment world right away.
you get it, right?
there was no way i'd get it.
what was this guy saying?!
did he want to say that the scholarship students――no, that yukikaze was doing those dirty things?!

name: tatsurou
normalized: there's no way yukikaze would do something like that, is there?!
i raised my voice without thinking.

name: morita
normalized: oi oi, don't get mad!
they say that kind of world does exist.

name: tatsurou
normalized: no!
there's no way it does.
it's crazy to believe rumours like that!

name: tatsurou
normalized: you seriously believe that?
that the elites of the elites are doing things like that at school?
i pressed morita, and he made a bored-looking face.

name: morita
normalized: tch, you're a guy with no dreams, aren't you?

name: tatsurou
normalized: something like that is not a dream.

name: morita
normalized: think about it properly!
if she is receiving erotic training, you could lose your virginity without that much effort, right?!

name: morita
normalized: so try asking her!
that was what he really thought?

name: tatsurou
normalized: ridiculous!
i spat out.
i was always exasperated by morita's stupid talk, but today i was seriously amazed.
i felt like i would go crazy if i engaged in this worthless conversation any longer.

name: morita
normalized: oi, wait, akiyama!
are you seriously gonna hog yukikaze-chan to yourself?
oi!
i'm begging you, send her around to me too～～!

name: tatsurou
normalized: shut up!
ignoring morita and his ingratiating voice, i left the cafeteria.
saying the scholarship students were doing things like that…
that was a typical baseless student rumour.
a wild fantasy.
so i decided.

name: tatsurou
normalized: （yukikaze, nothing strange is being done to you, right…?

name: tatsurou
normalized: （kuh… what am i thinking…?
that's impossible!
it was probably because i had guilty feelings myself, due to the matter with shizuru-san.
i was pathetic, feeling a tinge of anxiety because of such a stupid story.
